name: Winter Is Coming (MAd Developers)
description:
Save The Only One  Fire  Molecule(Player) From Coming Winter By Killing Snow Enemies and Surviving thier Snow Ball Attack!

Made in a hurry!First Time Participating 48 Hours Game Jam.....

Sounds,Levels, And Bugs Wil Be Fixed/Added in a update....

Please Comment your valuable Feedbacks and Suggestions... :)
